name: Pachinko Monogatari 2: Nagoya Shachihoko no Teiou
overview: Pachinko Monogatari 2: Nagoya Shachihoko no Teiou ("Pachinko Story 2: Emperor Shachihoko of Nagoya", where a shachihoko is a mythical tiger-carp creature often seen as rooftop ornaments) is a pachinko game for the Super Famicom. It follows 1993's Pachinko Monogatari: Pachi-Slot mo Aru deyo!!. The player has access to a large tower, each floor of which either contains pachinko machines or other distractions.
